app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2079-4991/11/1/58/s1, Table S1: Bond length and angles of the stable configuration when the central epoxy and nitroxyl cation are at different distances, Table S2: Bond length and angles of the stable configuration when the marginal epoxy and nitroxyl cation are at different distances, Table S3: Bond length and angles of the stable configuration when the marginal hydroxyl and nitroxyl cation are at different distances, Table S4: Bond length and angles of the stable configuration when the central hydroxyl and nitroxyl cation are at different distances.
